Text: On Admin Professional's Day, I recognize all the admins @Intel for their hard work behind – and directly in front of – the scenes. I can't thank my team enough: you make my work life run smoothly, you keep me sane, and you accept my #torrid pace.
Lovely to have @LeoVaradkar, Tánaiste (Deputy Prime Minister) of Ireland in Santa Clara today! https://t.co/C8FemZrfSl

Could there be a geekier way to share Intel trivia than w/ an old-school video game. #8Bit
https://t.co/s1UZWjb5Ee

During this season of Lent, it is my goal to deepen my faith and grow in friendship with those around me – physically or virtually. Today I will again be praying and fasting, especially for those in Ukraine. Please join me.
Congrats to the teams involved! Wonderful! https://t.co/6Mtv0pPT3F
@rnivruti @lkouniv Congrats @rnivruti! Proud to have you as part of #TeamIntel

Our own Carolyn Duran, VP & engineering manager, sat down to share about her 23-years at Intel. Read about her work as a woman in tech and how she’s continuing to change the world. #WomensHistoryMonth #InclusionAtIntel #IAmIntel https://t.co/GJHFJv33k2

Thank you, President @vonderleyen. Joining forces between governments and industry is a magnet for further investments in innovation, economies and communities across Europe. #IntelEurope https://t.co/HcYKuWQrgP

Overall, we envision investing up to €80 billion in the EU over the next decade along the entire semiconductor value chain – from R&D to design to advanced chip packaging to manufacturing and foundry services.

Government and industry working together furthers investments in innovation, economies and communities across Europe. We are committed to playing an essential role in shaping Europe’s digital future for decades to come. https://t.co/13DWSDMlID

We call our new planned Germany site the “silicon junction” because it connects the technology hubs across the country and region. (As a geek, I like that junction is a real term to describe a region in a semiconductor.)
That vision begins today, with an initial investment of more than 33 billion euros. There are multiple facets to this, across multiple countries, so let me walk through each one.

Today, I am pleased to announce our European investment plans. This is bigger than one fab or two fabs. This is a holistic investment strategy that will help create a next-gen European chip ecosystem and address the need for a more balanced and resilient supply chain.
Nice way to kick off the week: In an overwhelming show of support from our employees, the Intel Foundation has reached $2 million in total donations for Ukraine Humanitarian Aid.
#WeAreIntel stands w/ people of Ukraine & global community in condemning this war. Thoughts & prayers w/ all in Ukraine, surrounding areas, & all impacted around world.

I am hoping and praying for a swift return to peace in Ukraine and Russia. To our employees in the region and to those who have family and friends in the region, we are here for you. You have our full support during these difficult times.
It's Engineers Week (founded by @NSPE in 1951). Special thanks to @WeAreIntel Engineers this week - as well as the other 51.
@SandraLRivera Tell me Moore’s Law is alive and well without telling me Moore’s Law is alive and well. #IAmIntel

Today, @SandraLRivera previewed our dual-track Xeon roadmap to offer both a performance core and an ultra-efficient core family for our Xeon servers to meet the needs of a growing segment. I am excited about this!
https://t.co/X8XHtOrKhh

The team and I are honored to present our strategy, roadmap and execution for growth our annual investor day today. Listen in and hear why we are confident our best days are yet ahead.
https://t.co/pWfvFez9Ri
Since its founding, Intel has thrived on the relentless pursuit of semiconductor invention and innovation as described by Moore’s Law. Here's the future of it. https://t.co/uDob5rFzJR
Congratulations Siavash Alamouti! A well-deserved honor for someone who has contributed so much to the industry. #TechAsAForceForGood https://t.co/yo9K5Al52W

As a community college kid myself, thrilled to share @Intel @Dell & @AACC are selecting 10 community colleges for $400,000 in grants to build AI labs. In the U.S. demand for STEM workers is forecasted to grow over 10% this decade. https://t.co/jL0k1YsSWI
RT @intelnews: Intel’s disciplined focus on execution is reflected in our fourth-quarter and full-year 2021 financial results, says @PGelsi…

Fantastic @Mobileye updates coming from #CES2022. Thanks Prof. @AmnonShashua for providing an update on the mobility industry and taking us "under the hood." #AltogetherWonderful https://t.co/pn9DIPzEID
Great job, team @intel, representing our latest innovations! The fastest mobile processor ever, the Intel® Core™ i9-12900HK!  This one is must-see TV for geeks. https://t.co/6UvsoQh9jt
What an action-packed event! From Mobileye's new EyeQ chip to the best gaming laptop to discrete graphics shipping, today's wave of innovations has me excited for the opportunities of tomorrow.
You've heard me emphasize the importance of the CHIPS Act. Check out this podcast with #WeAreIntel @tommgarrisongives & @morhardt for additional details about it. https://t.co/As8sLoDSN1

We’re grateful to have the support of @SecRaimondo & @WhiteHouse to invest in U.S. chip production and are hopeful that the bipartisan #CHIPSAct will pass by the end of this year. https://t.co/b1BYDfVgwR
Since my first ride in an @Mobileye AV, I have been blown away by the incredible innovation that Mobileye brings to the auto and mobility sphere.

Today we are excited to announce @Intel’s intent to take @Mobileye public, unlocking value for @Intel shareholders as we continue building on Mobileye’s track record of innovation and growth. https://t.co/kfsz7vtR2r
Thank you @RonWyden for inviting me! It was wonderful speaking with you, @SenJeffMerkley and @portlandgeneral CEO Maria Pope today. (reposted w/ correct handles)

It’s an honor to be back “home” in Oregon at my first Oregon Business Plan Summit as Intel’s CEO. OR is critical for Intel – the heart of our manufacturing R&D as well as near to my heart, having raised my kids here.
Tech as a force for good improves lives! https://t.co/ZJAS6LKsn9
On this final night of the Festival of Lights - #HappyHannukkah to all who celebrate!
Let your light shine before others, that they may see your good deeds and glorify your Father in heaven. - Matthew 5:16

My open mic audition ... think I got the part? 
Check out our line-up of speakers for Intel Innovation next week! https://t.co/fJg92eNIzU #IntelOn https://t.co/OJhNxF4pVd
Can’t wait to geek out with developers at Intel Innovation next week! https://t.co/fJg92eNIzU #intelON

I will join EU Commissioner Thierry Breton for a livestreamed conversation on the semi shortage: the EU Chips Act, the "third way" proposal to enhance its strategic autonomy and the important role #intel can play. Ask a question using code #CERREchips. https://t.co/ZlVJ5l7W2h

We got to open the @intel museum so I could geek out with @inafried with @axios before we sat down to talk about technology, corporate responsibility, manufacturing, global supply chain and more. Great conversation!

The security of our products is one of our most important priorities. We strive to design, manufacture and sell the world’s most secure technology products, and we are continuously innovating and enhancing security capabilities for our products. https://t.co/s8uYEgqP8M

We were honored to host President George W. Bush at our Government Affairs Advisory Committee meeting to discuss his time in the Oval Office and the challenges facing the semiconductor industry. https://t.co/8yAY6UUQOT
Thanks for having me on today. https://t.co/IMT14BTEzP
Thanks for having me on! https://t.co/uq5rDDMLlb
Always fun to be on @MadMoneyOnCNBC with @jimcramer. Thanks for having me today!

Great chatting with @AntonioNeri_HPE about the next wave of innovation across networking, AI, Edge & many ways @intel and @hpe are building for the future. Congrats on the launch of your Gen10 Plus portfolio! https://t.co/KK4Y7211pW
Happy Earth Day 2021! Here's to a year that significantly accelerates our progress toward addressing the world’s most critical challenges.
Please join us April 6 for the launch of the latest 3rd Gen Intel® Xeon® Scalable Portfolio at an event where we will unveil the next chapter in our edge to cloud vision. https://t.co/bCJvcuRPhR

Intel is proud to continue expanding in #Arizona with two new fabs to increase our U.S. semiconductor manufacturing capacity. Thank you, Governor @DougDucey, for your continued partnership and support. https://t.co/oAZxR1iSra

Thank you, @SecRaimondo, for your support for domestic investment in semiconductor innovation and manufacturing. We look forward to partnering with @CommerceGov and the Biden Administration to help grow the U.S. economy. https://t.co/qklD7JE6gQ

Intel’s advanced #manufacturing scale is critical for the U.S. and the world, and we are investing $20 billion in two new state-of-the-art fabs in #Arizona to help meet growing demand for semiconductors. That's only the start! https://t.co/vivmpZAtOv

Thank you, @satyanadella, for your continued support of the historic @Intel + @Microsoft partnership of innovation. As we undergo this "radical" transformation with chips becoming more specialized and the cloud becoming more optimized, customer collaboration is critical.

Thank you, @arvindkrishna, for joining me today in the @intel Unleashed webcast to announce the #intel and #IBM research collaboration to accelerate next-generation logic and packaging technology innovation. Together, our brilliant teams can make a profound mark on the industry.
Intel's future is bright and its best days truly are ahead. And I'm about to share why in our Intel Unleashed event. Tune in here at 2 p.m. PT today. https://t.co/2M6UBrY1D3
@steveathanas @VMware @intel @MyVMUG Was always great working with you Steve, thank you for everything.

One of the key steps we are taking is to double the Matching Gift that employees are eligible to donate for 2020, so they can support communities in need during this difficult time.
